original: @180b * // yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba //
analyzed: @180b * // yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba //
translated: Are called the “pledges of the branches.”

original: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
translated: Not possessing the pledges,🔽One should not enjoy relying on a knowledge consort,🔽One should not quarrel in the ganacakra,

original: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang // gsad ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // sems can dad dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang // gsad ba'i chos ni ston pa dang // sems can dad dang ldan pa la //
translated: One should not teach the Dharma of killing,

original: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang // nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i //
analyzed: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang // nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i //
translated: One should not teach the true Dharma to those who have faith in other religions,🔽And one should not boast of being a śrāvaka.🔽One should not stay indoors for seven days,

original: nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang // sbyor ba nges par ma byas par //
analyzed: nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang // sbyor ba nges par ma byas par //
translated: And one should not engage in the activities without first being initiated.

original: skal min gsang ba ston pa dang // gang zhig phyag rgya mi mkhas la//
analyzed: skal min gsang ba ston pa dang // gang zhig phyag rgya mi mkhas la//
translated: One should not teach the secret to those who are not fit,🔽And one should not display the physical mudrā

original: lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang // bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par //
analyzed: lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang // bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par //
translated: To those who are not skilled in the seals.🔽One should not engage in the maṇḍala activities🔽Without having purified the approach and so forth,

original: dkyil 'khor las la 'jug pa dang // sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa la //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor las la 'jug pa dang // sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa la //
translated: And one should not transgress the injunctions of the two vows🔽Without a special purpose.

original: dgos pa med par 'da' ba ni //🔽kha na tho bcas 'gyur te //
analyzed: dgos pa med par 'da' ba ni // kha na tho bcas 'gyur te //
translated: To do so is to commit a downfall,

original: sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad //
analyzed: sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad //
translated: And the mantra practitioner’s pledges will be exhausted.
Since they are exhausted, one will not be successful,

original: bdud dang sdug bsngal mang du 'phel //
analyzed: bdud dang sdug bsngal mang du 'phel //
translated: And one’s suffering and evil will increase.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
translated: Three times during the day and night,

original: nyin re zhing ni bzla sbar bya //
analyzed: nyin re zhing ni bzla sbar bya //
translated: one should recite and increase daily.

original: yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba rdzogs so//
translated: The so-called branch commitments are complete.
